contest-event.event-date:
May 12, 2013 D Europäischer Musikwettbewerb UGDA (Brass Band)
UGDA [European Contest for Championship Section Bands] 0 Set Test and Own Choice
union-grand-duc-adolphe
Connotations
Philharmonie Luxembourg, Luxembourg City, Luxembourg District, Luxembourg 1st Edition [European Contest for Championship Section - Wind/Fanfare/Brass - Band]
Contest held as part of the 150th birthday celebrations of the Union Grand-Duc Adolphe UGDA (Own choice section consisted of a 25 minute programme).
Winner Harmonie: Koninklijke Harmonie van Thorn (NL) Winner Fanfare: Fanfareorkest De Hoop Stellendam (NL)
May 13, 2013, 8:41 p.m. May 3, 2017, 1:29 p.m.
1 Brassband Buizingen Luc Vertommen When Worlds Collide
2 Fanfare Concordia Vétroz Géo-Pierre Moren Tristan Encounters
3 Brass Band De Wâldsang Rieks van der Velde Enter the Galaxies
4 Brass Band Conservatoire d'Esch Guy Conter
5 Brass Band Düren Martin Schädlich Elegy I: Jealousy
